Title: The Prowler
Writer: Glenn Leopold, Neal Barbera, Eric Lewald (additional dialogue), Mark Edward Edens (additional dialogue), Michael Edens (additional dialogue), Sarah Higgins (writer "Rose Chatham's Letter")
Actors: Vicky Dawson, Christopher Goutman, Lawrence Tierney, Farley Granger
Plot: An unknown killer, clad in World War II U.S. Army fatigues, stalks a small New Jersey town bent on reliving a 35 year-old double murder by focusing on a group of college kids holding an annual Spring Dance.
